name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, A15 Bionic chip, and 5G capability.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 offers a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 processor, and a triple camera setup.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: The Google Pixel 6 features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, Google Tensor chip, and an advanced dual-camera system.

name: OnePlus 9
description: The OnePlus 9 comes with a 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and Hasselblad camera system.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones offer noise cancellation, up to 30 hours of battery life, and superior sound quality.

name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
description: The Bose QuietComfort 35 II provides industry-leading noise cancellation, Alexa voice control, and comfortable ear cushions.

name: Apple AirPods Pro
description: The AirPods Pro come with active noise cancellation, a customizable fit, and spatial audio with dynamic head tracking.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 3
description: The Sennheiser Momentum 3 headphones feature noise cancellation, a stylish design, and high-fidelity sound.

name: iPad Pro 11-inch
description: The iPad Pro 11-inch features a Liquid Retina display, M1 chip, and compatibility with Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
description: The Galaxy Tab S7 includes an 11-inch LTPS TFT display, Snapdragon 865+ processor, and S Pen functionality.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
description: The Surface Pro 7 is a 2-in-1 device with a 12.3-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core processors, and versatile kickstand.

name: Apple iPad Air
description: The iPad Air offers a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, and compatibility with the Magic Keyboard.

name: MacBook Air M1
description: The MacBook Air M1 features a 13.3-inch Retina display, Apple M1 chip, and up to 18 hours of battery life.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 offers a 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a sleek aluminum chassis.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: The HP Spectre x360 is a 2-in-1 laptop with a 13.3-inch OLED display, Intel Core i7 processor, and 360-degree hinge.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon features a 14-inch display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a durable carbon fiber chassis.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: The Logitech MX Master 3 is an advanced wireless mouse with customizable buttons, ergonomic design, and long battery life.

name: Apple Magic Keyboard
description: The Apple Magic Keyboard features a sleek design, scissor mechanism keys, and a built-in rechargeable battery.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD
description: The Samsung T7 Portable SSD offers fast read/write speeds, a compact design, and up to 2TB of storage capacity.

name: Anker PowerCore 10000
description: The Anker PowerCore 10000 is a compact portable charger with a 10000mAh capacity and fast-charging technology.
